column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=It had been a long , hard day and I needed a good bath .
#text=First I picked out clean clothes and got towels from the hall closet .
#text=I put the plug in the bathtub drain , and then started to fill the tub with nice hot water .
#text=I disrobed and stepped into the tub , then carefully settled in .
#text=First I got my hair wet , shampooed , and washed away the shampoo using a toy bucket .
#text=I wet my washcloth , rubbed it heartily with soap until a lather formed , and then scrubbed my skin all over until I was good and clean .
#text=I submerged in the tub water and soaked for a while .
#text=I spent a bit of time with a toy submarine , pretending it was in the ocean .
#text=At the end , I pulled the plug and let the water drain .
#text=I took a quick shower to rinse off any soap .
#text=Then I dried myself , got out of the tub and put on the clean clothes .
